document.full_text: paul ryan, the wisconsin republican who runs the house budget committee, has called for dramatic spending cuts. whether his star will rise further depends on his willingness to compromise.
document.title: letter from washington: no sharp edges, but big scissors, for republican star
lines_and_colors: paul ryan, the wisconsin republican who runs the house budget committee, has called for dramatic spending cuts. whether his star will rise further depends on his willingness to compromise.
